summary: This is an email chain from October 2021 regarding an interview related to the Epstein case, involving a Detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York. The email requests notes and a 302 report from an interview.

persons.name: Lara
persons.context: Requests interview notes and a 302 report from a detective regarding an Epstein-related investigation.

events.title: Email request for interview materials
events.description: Assistant United States Attorney Lara emails a detective requesting notes and a 302 report from an interview related to the Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: The email involves a Detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force, indicating ongoing investigative collaboration.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is requesting interview notes and a 302 report, showing continued legal activity in the Epstein case in 2021.
The email is dated October 2021, demonstrating that investigative and legal work related to Epstein was still active years after his death.
